job_title: Senior Audio Visual Technician in London, England
pros: Very nice place to work, colleagues are great
cons: old structure, bit slow in advancing project

job_title: Membership Retention and Recruitment Coordinator in London, England
pros:
Beautiful building and collections, despite being not valued by management
Great staff, friendly and welcoming
Subsidised cooked lunch
Pleasant offices
cons:
Poor management who are terrified to lose control so they micromanage every detail, withhold all management information to a tight circle and get threatened by change
Large staff turnover due to boredom and frustration
A badly behaved, rude, out of control head of department, who also knows little outside her own limited experience but constantly meddles in areas outside her responsibility.  She is kept on as the director prefers this person to be the face of her bad decisions
